marklogic.body:
childish nonsense why the building Burns
stop the debt, stop the spending - there's your future if you want it
the stock market has fallen and the new focus that it must Always go up to keep the economy going is a distraction to keep major issues like the debt from being dealt with
our country, our lives are now 100% about the stock market and it's a democrat who brought it, and once again you 99% are getting screwed. if you're a 1% you're voting democrat that's for sure. this guy has one objective - keep the economy looking good via the stock mkt at all times. we may see DOW 20,000 if he is reelected.
